#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int cmp(const void *a,const void *b)
{
return(strcmp((char *)a,(char *)b));
}
int main()
{
int n,m,i,j,count;
while(scanf("%d %d",&n,&m) && n!=0 &&m!=0)
{
count=1;
int clone[n+1];
memset(clone,0,sizeof clone);
char str[n][m+1];
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
scanf("%s",str[i]);
qsort(str,n,(m+1)*sizeof(char),cmp);
//for(i=0;i<n;i++)
//cout<<str[i]<<endl;
for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
{
if(strcmp(str[i],str[i+1])==0)
        count++;
else
{
clone[count]+=1;
count=1;
}
if(i==n-2)
clone[count]+=1;
}
for(i=1;i<n+1;i++)
printf("%d\n",clone[i]);
}
return 0;
}
